mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_class_stats (user_id, class_number, total, total_solved, essentials, essential_solved, decoration) VALUES (#{userId}, #{classNumber}, #{total}, #{totalSolved}, #{essentials}, #{essentialSolved}, #{decoration}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total = VALUES(total), total_solved = VALUES(total_solved), essentials = VALUES(essentials), essential_solved = VALUES(essential_solved), decoration = VALUES(decoration), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_class_stats WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY class_number
SELECT * FROM user_class_stats WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND class_number = #{classNumber}
